department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

remark.ch: 研究所領域分類:材料類

goal.en: This course tends to systematically introduce materials for biomedical application. The content mainly includes the properties and processing of biomaterials as well as its application and possible problems. This course should be able to train student to independently design and execute relative experiments.
goal.ch: 系統性地針對使用於生物醫學之材料進行介紹，內容包含生醫材料之特性、製造、應用與可能遭受的問題，以期學生能夠獨立發掘問題並設計實驗進行相關的研究。

content.en:
"1. Materials for Biomedical Applications
2. Chemical Structure of Biomaterials
3. Physical Properties of Biomaterials
4. Mechanical Properties of Biomaterials
5. Biomaterial Degradation
6. Biomaterial Processing
7. Surface Properties of Biomaterials
8. Protein Interactions with Biomaterials
9. Cell Interactions with Biomaterials
10. Biomaterial Implantation and Acute Inflammation
11. Wound Healing and the Presence of Biomaterials
12. Immune Response to Biomaterials
13. Biomaterials and Thrombosis
14. Infection, Tumorigenesis and Calcification of Biomaterials"
content.ch:

textbook.en: "Textbook Biomaterials: The Intersection of Biology and Materials Science Edited by JS Temenoff and AG Mikos 1st Ed. Pearson Press. 2008 Supplementary Reading: Biomaterials Science-An introduction to Materials in Medicine, Ratner B.D. Hoffman A.S., Schoen F.J., and Lemons, J.E. 2nd Ed, Academic Press, 2004 生醫材料 劉士榮、高宜娟 著 第一版 滄海書局 2010"
